title: Count circuits per link (minimize links used)
text: Each call consumes one circuit on every link it traverses. To maximize how many calls can run simultaneously without exceeding any link capacity, pick call endpoints and routes that use the fewest links possible (i.e., neighboring switches). Then add up the capacity available on each link to get the maximum total number of simultaneous calls.
